context_of_use: This use case allows admins to monitor and adjust inventory levels to prevent stockouts and maintain availability.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control inventory levels to ensure product availability.
description: This use case enables admins to manage inventory levels effectively to prevent stockouts.
triggering_event: Admin initiates the inventory management process.
preconditions: Admin is authenticated and authorized to manage inventory.
postconditions: Inventory levels are updated and reflect the current stock status.
assumptions: The admin has the necessary permissions to manage inventory.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to manage inventory levels.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the specific inventory management functionalities required.
main_flow: 1. Admin accesses the inventory management interface → System displays current inventory levels.
2. Admin adjusts inventory levels for selected products → System updates inventory levels accordingly.
3. Admin saves changes → System confirms the updates and reflects new inventory levels.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the admin is not authenticated, the system prompts for login.
